Package com.ibm.streams.management.job

Interface OperatorInputPortMXBean

All Superinterfaces:
OperatorPortMXBean
public interface OperatorInputPortMXBean extends OperatorPortMXBean
OperatorInputPortMXBean provides attributes, operations, and notifications for managing an operator input port of a Streams job.

Note: The job must be registered before accessing any of these attributes or operations. See InstanceMXBean.registerJob(BigInteger) for more information.

ObjectNameBuilder.operatorInputPort(String, String, BigInteger, String, int) can be used to build the ObjectName for a OperatorInputPortMXBean.

Notifications:
A OperatorInputPortMXBean supports sending the following notifications:

javax.management.AttributeChangeNotification.ATTRIBUTE_CHANGE
Only a subset of the attributes support attribute change notification. A note is included in the attribute description for each attribute that supports attribute change notification

    • IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT

      static final String IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TYPE

      static final String TYPE
      TYPE is used to identify this bean as an operator input port bean when building the bean's ObjectName. The value is "domain.instance.job.operator.port.input"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getImportFilter

      String getImportFilter()
      Returns the import filter of the operator input port. Returns null if there is no import filter defined.

      Note: Attribute change notification is supported for this attribute.

      Returns:
      the import filter.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getImportNames

      Set<NamedImport> getImportNames()
      Returns the import names of the operator input port. If the import type is not NAME an empty list is returned.
      Returns:
      the import name information.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getImportType

      OperatorInputPortMXBean.ImportType getImportType()
      Returns the import type of the operator input port.
      Returns:
      the import type.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getImportSubscription

      String getImportSubscription()
      Returns the import subscription of the operator input port. If the import type is not SUBSCRIPTION null is returned.

      Note: Attribute change notification is supported for this attribute.

      Returns:
      the import subscription.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getImportSubscriptionApplicationScope

      String getImportSubscriptionApplicationScope()
      Returns the application scope of the exporting application when the import type is subscription. If the application scope was not explicitly set for the import, null is returned and the default application scope is used. If the import type is not SUBSCRIPTION null is returned.
      Returns:
      the application scope
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getImportSubscriptionOperator

      String getImportSubscriptionOperator()
      Returns the import operator of the operator input port when the import type is subscription. If the import type is not SUBSCRIPTION null is returned.
      Returns:
      the import subscription operator.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getPeInputPorts

      Set<Integer> getPeInputPorts()
      Returns the indexes within the PE of the PE input ports associated with the operator input port. This set is empty if there are no PE input ports associated with the operator input port.
      Returns:
      the PE input port indexes. This is a zero-based index.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.
      See Also:
      • PeInputPortMXBean

    • retrieveStreamType

      String retrieveStreamType()
      Returns an HTTPS URI to retrieve the tuple type information for the stream associated with the input port.
      Returns:
      an HTTPS URI to access the stream type information in application/json format. This URI is valid for a single access for up to two minutes.

      The stream type information is provided in JSON format with an array tupleAttributes parameter. Each item in the tupleAttributes array has the format described in the product documentation on the REST tuple attributes collection resource. except the REST specific properties: next, previous, total, and resourceType are not included.

      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. For more information see the product documentation on security objects.
